shallow.translation[0].definitions[0].de: measuring only a short distance from the top to the bottom
shallow.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: the shallow end of the pool
Place the meat in a shallow dish.
shallow.translation[0].definitions[1].de: not interested in or not showing any understanding of important or serious matters – used to show disapproval
shallow.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: If he’s only interested in your looks, that shows how shallow he is.
